abstract: Latinos in Suffolk County, NY, file federal class-action lawsuit accusing county's police of widespread pattern of racial discrimination and harassment; accusations come amid a national climate of outrage over police practices.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit says the Police Department engaged in a widespread pattern of racial discrimination that occurred even while the Justice Department was investigating it for bias.

headline.main: Latinos, in Class-Action Case, Accuse Suffolk County Police of Bias and Harassment
